title: SPANISH FILM/MEDIA: CULTURAL ISSUES
description:
Cat. II
Through Spanish films, and other media sources, this course studies images,
 topics, and cultural and historical issues that have had an impact in the creation
 of a modern Spanish nation. This course focuses on current political and 
ideological issues (after 1936), the importance of Spanish Civil war, gender 
identity, and class, cultural and power relationships. This course is taught in 
Spanish.
This course will be offered in 2016-17, and in alternating years thereafter.
